user.title: Connect to BLOOMIN8 E-Ink Canvas
user.description: Set up your BLOOMIN8 E-Ink Canvas display.

data.name: Display Name
data.ble_auto_wake: Auto wake via BLE before API calls

data_description.ble_device: Optional: pick your Canvas from Home Assistant's discovered Bluetooth devices (requires Bluetooth / BLE proxies). If set, the device will be woken via BLE and the setup will wait ~10s before connecting via IP.
data_description.mac_address: Optional: used to wake the device via BLE when it is in deep sleep (format: AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF). If set, the setup will wake the device and wait ~10s before connecting via IP.
data_description.ble_auto_wake: If enabled, the integration will try to wake the device via BLE (using the Bluetooth MAC address) before sending HTTP API commands. Requires Home Assistant Bluetooth and a connectable device (e.g. via BLE proxy).
data_description.orientation: Select portrait or landscape based on how your frame is mounted
data_description.fill_mode: Auto: cover if same orientation, contain if different. Cover: crop to fill. Contain: fit with background color
data_description.contain_color: Background color used when image doesn't fill the screen (contain mode)
